name: @dimensional/napi-canon-cameras
description: Node AddOn Api module for Canon cameras. Wrapper for the Canon EDSDK.

scripts.prebuild: npm run prebuild:ia32 && npm run prebuild:x64 && npm run build:stubs
scripts.build:stubs: npm run _update:stubs && npm run _build:stubs:types && npm run _build:es2015 && npm run _build:esm && npm run _build:umd && npm run _build:umd:min
scripts.clean: node-gyp clean && rimraf prebuilds/* && npm run _clean:stubs
scripts._build:esm: tsc -p src/stubs/ --module es2015 --target es5 --lib es2015 --removeComments --outDir stubs/esm
scripts._build:umd: rollup stubs/esm/index.js -f umd -n napi-canon-cameras-stubs -m inline --context window -o stubs/umd/napi-canon-cameras-stubs.js
scripts._build:umd:min: cd stubs/umd && uglifyjs -c -m --source-map -o napi-canon-cameras-stubs.min.js -- napi-canon-cameras-stubs.js && node ../../helpers/gzip-file.js napi-canon-cameras-stubs.min.js > napi-canon-cameras-stubs.min.js.gz
